title: Dem kids be starving for muh friendship
body:
http://i.imgur.com/IMc2put.jpg

Why wont dem kids try to friend someone when they lose a game or the person who didn't carry them?

Oh look, he so gud, he must be a smurf, better invite him to be muh friend.
NO B{{champion:17}} TCH! I dont want to be your F{{champion:17}} cking friend just so I can carry your {{champion:17}}ss with this welfare duo system.
This is exactly what's wrong with this communist community.
